Welcome to nostr.industries

Verify your Nostr username, for free.

Note: Verification is currently disabled.
The process is still fully manual and there are too many requests right now.
I'm looking for a way to automate this and open up again.

If you tried to verify but didn't hear from me yet:
Please stay patient a bit longer, I am working on the queue.
Thanks!
Please read this carefully
Your request has been submitted, thank you!
Verification is currently a manual process and might take a while.
You will receive a notification on nostr when it is done.

After receiving the notification:
  1. Edit your nostr profile
  2. Enter username@nostr.industries into the NIP-05 identifier field
  3. Save your profile
Congratulations, you are verified!
loading…
*Hint: If your public key starts with "npub", you'll have to convert it to hex first.
Head over to the damus key converter to do so.

This service is free, but it costs USD $4/month to operate and (unless it can be automated) manually adding users takes time.

If you like this service, please consider a small lightning ⚡ donation to keep it up:
